name: Scotcheroos on a Stick
author: Anonymous
summary: Perfect for your next bake sale or an easy to eat backyard BBQ treat.
ingredients: 1 cup Karo® Light or Dark Corn Syrup
chopped peanuts, colored sprinkles, finely chopped candy bars
directions: Combine corn syrup and sugar together in a large pan over medium heat, stirring to dissolve sugar
Stir in peanut butter; mix well
Add cereal; stir until evenly coated
Let cool in pan for 5 minutes
Coat hands with butter or spray with cooking spray
Form Scotcheroo mixture into 1-inch balls and place on waxed paper
Carefully insert lollipop sticks into each ball
Place chocolate chips in a microwave-safe bowl
Microwave on HIGH 1 to 2 minutes, stirring frequently until chocolate is melted
Dip half of each ball into melted chocolate
Immediately sprinkle with toppings, if desired
Cool at least 1-1/2 hours until chocolate is completely set
